text: The Pittsburgh Pirates were an American professional ice hockey team in the National Hockey League (NHL), based in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania from 1925–26 to 1929–30. The nickname comes from the baseball team also based in the city. For the 1930–31 season the team moved to Philadelphia, Pennsylvania and played one season as the Philadelphia Quakers. ==Other websites== *Results on hockeydb.com Category:Defunct National Hockey League teams Category:Sports in Pittsburgh Category:1925 establishments in the United States Category:1920s establishments in Pennsylvania
title: Pittsburgh Pirates (NHL)
